titleInfo.title: R. M. Bigelow correspondence with Mrs. Ames, 1865 December 15

mods.abstract: Letter dated 1865 December 15, from Mrs. R. M. Bigelow to Mrs. Ames. Mrs. Bigelow talks about an invitation she received to participate in the founding of a school, her participation in lady's aid societies, and what she is planning for Christmas.
